rule_text: A ship is a unit type consisting of carriers, cruisers, dreadnoughts, destroyers, fighters, and war suns. Each race also has a unique flagship.   65.1 Ships are always placed in space.   65.2 A player can have a number of ships in a system equal to or less than the number of command tokens in his fleet pool.    Fighters do not count toward the fleet pool limit, and    instead count against a player's capacity.   65.3 Ships can have any number of the following attributes: cost, combat, move, and capacity. These attributes are shown on both a ship's faction sheet and a ship's technology cards.         Capacity       Cost       Combat       Fleet Pool       Move       Space Combat       Units
